hooks.name: orchestrator
hooks.description: Orchestrates: dependency validation → import validation → linting → formatting

individual_hooks.check-dependencies: Validates package installations (Bash commands) to prevent malicious dependencies
individual_hooks.validate-imports: Validates import paths exist and respect feature boundaries (Edit/Write)
individual_hooks.lint-after-edit: Runs ESLint with --fix after file edits (Edit/Write)
individual_hooks.format-on-edit: Automatically formats files with Prettier after edits (Edit/Write)

notes: Claude Code only allows ONE hook per event type
The orchestrator chains all hooks together in sequence
Each hook is smart enough to skip if the tool doesn't match (e.g., check-dependencies only runs on Bash)
